title: New: Cold Water Music – Stop Moaning
content:
Life got in the way recently, so I’ve been sleeping on track after track, pieces of music that slowly lose their ability to be written about.

The Internet can be fickle. Stop Moaning however, the so far defining track from Cold Water Music, is a cut that still seems eager to be discovered. Over the 3 month period I’ve been aware of it, it’s regularly lingered in my music listening routine. It’s an achingly protectoral little number. Sitting neatly between XXYYXX and Nicolas Jaar, it drifts off into a conflicted expression of positivity and grace that defines both artists, whilst remaining effected by the subject matter; sometimes people need help.

 

Cold Water Music’s soundcloud.
